body: You are right. I am myself asking now why. I think what happened was I was copying a lot of the initialization style from the old TH, like THCRandom_init etc. and was going through some indecision about making mt19937 a pointer or variable and other shenanigans. I will fix this and use the copy constructor of mt19937.
body_html: You are right. I am myself asking now why. I think what happened was I was copying a lot of the initialization style from the old TH, like THCRandom_init etc. and was going through some indecision about making mt19937 a pointer or variable and other shenanigans. I will fix this and use the copy constructor of mt19937.
body_text: You are right. I am myself asking now why. I think what happened was I was copying a lot of the initialization style from the old TH, like THCRandom_init etc. and was going through some indecision about making mt19937 a pointer or variable and other shenanigans. I will fix this and use the copy constructor of mt19937.
